title: When your team won't let you redeem a charge of Spoils of War

replies.body: All to often this happens to me.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/405/669/9ea.gif
what on earth is THAT

He is a monument to all our feels.

creepiest gif ever

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kYL3hR7m,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:26:21.346+0000)
>
> All to often this happens to me.

you are a really hot girl gamer

{{champion:201}} "Hey, can I use my Relic Shield?"
{{champion:201}} "Hey lol let me get the siege minions please"
{{champion:201}} "Any minion I attack means that we both will get the gold"
{{champion:201}} "In case you just can't tell, those hovering blue orbs around me? Relic Shield."
{{champion:67}} "Shut the @!#$ up you whiny little !@#$"
{{champion:201}} *sells Relic Shield and gets ancient coin, then goes mid*

Almost every game.
and then the ADC wonders why we go to top/mid and never return to their side.

Being a tier 5 Braum, I know exactly what you're talking about.

By the way, when I say Tier 5, I mean I failed so much with Braum the points added up.

And you stop to type "PLZ LET ME USE SPOILS". Team, "what're those"
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
i googled it, i usually dont play support tank
You're that ninja... {{champion:238}}
I have switched to coin at times because of this.
Happens all the time... especially when trying for the cannon minion T.T

> [{quoted}](name=TallyZrg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kYL3hR7m,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-20T21:38:45.823+0000)
>
> Happens all the time... especially when trying for the cannon minion T.T

I've just given up on it really,I take whatever I can get.

My priority list of execute targets are: Cannon > Melee > Caster

Ordered according to how much gold they give.
Mine is Fed carry>support>turret>cannon>caster>melee>My ADC
Too bad relic shield line doesn't execute 4 of the things you listed :P
Oh, we're not talking about relic shield. We're talking murder.

Woah woah woah, back up mate. YOU are talking about murder. I'M talking about relic shield.

Don't lump me in with filthy murderers like yourself :P
{{champion:35}} Let's have some REAL fun!
Pls no. The voices are talking to me again{{champion:17}}
*Distant chanting of phrases from the Kabala*
Solution: main {{champion:223}} ; all you can eat cannon minions.
And so my TK main friend proceeds to eat the Cannon, spit it out of Spoils range,  then use Spoils stacks on ranged minons when there are melee ones nearby.

I've had platinum players burn abilities to take siege minions as I'm going for them. It's either they're straight up trolling or don't have a basic understanding of support items, both scenarios are really pathetic.
Support life is hard bro ,didnt you know supports dont need gold they only buy wards its the meta!

{{champion:67}} "Braum, why aren't you tanky?"
{{champion:201}} "Maybe I would be if you let me proc MY FUCKING RELIC SHIIEEEELD!"
{{champion:67}} "Report Braum for toxic."
{{champion:201}} "Jarvan, camp mid. I heard top lane needs a gank."
I have been told to stop taking CS before when I have spoils, then i have to explain to the ADC what they are.

>
> I have been told to stop taking CS before when I have spoils, then i have to explain to the ADC what they are.

I love that they never notice that they GOT the gold from the cannon minion even though they didn't kill it. Like... How do you notice that you didn't get a minion, but you DON'T notice that you got gold from doing nothing?
Kind of like kalista's passive. I try to tell them that they get the gold if I proc it. But they keep saying, "Report supp for stealing cs". {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
imagine. kali/spoils support. they can cs all they please.

I chose to farm champions over spoils
{{summoner:11}} {{champion:53}}
I'll legit grab a siege minion and ult it just to make sure i get it. Then my ADC will yell at me for wasting cooldowns but it's like, LET ME USE IT AND I WON'T HAVE TO DO THIS.

Blitz ult has a cooldown?
That's a great joke. ;p
That's only when you're the enemy. When you're a Blitzcrank desperately trying to fling yourself to consume your spoils on minions, those 20 or so seconds become a lifetime.
if the adc is a dick, i'll just smite cannons. -% summoner cd mastery. Smite is up every other wave (right on time).

Always smitecrank. Why? 1. you can ward enemies first buff (bot) while they are completing their first camp, pull at 500 health, smite, aa. 2. in lane you can q through a minion and smite it if their adc is just standing behind one. Really easy to pull off. 3. late game, having an extra smite is very underrated. 4. if your adc is a skillshot magnet, you'll probably want exhaust (aka solo q).

{{champion:53}} {{summoner:11}}
adcs should be required to at least play support secondary so they even know what half of what they put their partners through.
This would be a good suggestion, except for one thing.  Some people can't play tanks.  Others can't play squishies(like me).  But yes they should at least get a taste of the other role in their lane.

If ADC's can't play squishies. . .
I have concerns.

I should have clarified that a little bit.  Some people (adcs) can't play tanks because they are used to playing adcs and killing things.  Others (the supports) can't play squishies.  Sorry for not making that clear in the first place.

I more or less got what you meant.
Though I gotta say. . .

If supports can't play squishes. . .
I have concerns.
{{champion:432}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:143}} ;p

I play support all the time and can't play squishies (with the exception of lux and soraka, both of whom I can play and not die in.  Mostly. Soraka is iffy for me).  

{{champion:89}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:12}}  are tanky enough that I just get into a fight and stay in a fight.

That's why I stopped playing tanky support champions (Leona, Braum, Thresh, Blitzcrank), as the gold share/heal was a required explanation which I eventually got fed up with giving.

And so I turned to utility/healer mages instead (Nami, Janna, Bard), just to get away from that problem.
